name: Splitted Soul
description:
The game was made for GDevelop Game Jam #3

Instructions:

Gather all the souls to finish the game. Also try to get the stars if you can.

Controls:

Moving: Arrow keys / A and D
Jumping: Z / Space bar
Dashing: X / Left Shift
Restart Level: R 

Credits:

The game was made by ntb896
Tools used: GDevelop, Pixilart, Bosca Ceoil

Liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/ntb896/splitted-soul

Feel free to leave any feedback in the comments!
